Author: bongshelter
Text: You deserve to eat, whenever and whatever you want. You deserve to enjoy everything that the holidays have to offer. You deserve to be happy.  It's hard to believe sometimes, but your weight has nothing to do with your value. It doesn't change who you are.

Author: IDKijustdrinkhere
Text: I’m sorry you’re hanging a hard time. You are allowed to eat what you want.   I am trying to be nice to myself and allow myself to eat my favorites and not punish myself. I wish you the same.
